job.description: dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers our client priamba soft is seeking the following apply via dice todayltbrgtltbrgtjob title lte system test engineer location philadelphia pa job description we are looking for an lte system validation and testing engineer with at least years of experience as a mobile network integrationvalidation engineer for a vendor and good knowledge of lte technology key experience experienced as a mobile network integrationvalidation engineer on g technology familiar with mobiles ue modems validation process good knowledge of lte technology radio interface sx protocols lte features responsible for lte test case development test execution and issues troubleshooting proven ability to diagnose and localize technical problems using logical analysis techniques strong analytical and problemsolving skills ability to communicate easily with customers about technical issues experience in using qxdm wireshark tool for log analysis responsibilities responsible for developing and executing test cases on clients lte equipment in customer premises responsible for providing rootcause analysis of the issue addons experience in one of the test measurement platforms for device certification spirentkeysightanritsurs knowledge of spirent cmw equipment is a plus exposure to protocol conformance and carrier acceptance testing using simulatorsemulators
